headline: How Investors May Respond To T. Rowe Price Group (TROW) and Goldman Sachs' Strategic Retirement Investing Partnership
summary: On September 4, Goldman Sachs and T. Rowe Price announced a strategic collaboration to deliver co-branded public and private market investment solutions focused on retirement and wealth investors, with Goldman Sachs intending to invest up to US$1 billion in T. Rowe Price common stock and target a 3.5% ownership stake through open-market purchases. This partnership is set to combine the firms’ expertise for new offerings in target-date funds, model portfolios, and multi-asset vehicles, aiming...
